branchCategory.name: CU
branchCategory.description: <p>The series CU free mount cylinder saves space and allows direct and precise mounting. It is available in 6mm to 32mm bore sizes with stroke lengths up to 50mm. Options include auto switch capabilities, free mount choices, recessed switch mounting grooves, non-rotating rod, double rod, single and double acting, and rubber bumpers standard.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)U, Free Mount Cylinder, Double Acting
C(D)U, Free Mount Cylinder, Long Stroke
C(D)UW, Free Mount Cylinder, Double Rod
C(D)U, Free Mount Cylinder, Single Acting

C(D)UK, Free Mount Cylinder, Non-rotating, Single Acting
C(D)UKW, Free Mount Cylinder, Non-rotating, Double Rod
branchItem.description: <p>The series CUKW double non-rotating rod, double acting free mount cylinder saves space and allows direct and precise mounting. It is available in 6mm to 32mm bore sizes with stroke lengths up to 50mm. Options include auto-switch capabilities, free mount choices, recessed switch mounting grooves and rubber bumpers standard.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)U-A, Free Mount Cylinder with Air Cushion
branchItem.description: <p>The series CU-A single rod, double acting, air cushion free mount cylinder saves space and allows direct and precise mounting. Air cushion is used to help with end of stroke noise and has higher kinetic energy absorption. Options include auto-switch capabilities, free mount choices, recessed switch mounting grooves and rubber bumpers standard.</p>

branchItem.name: C(D)UX, Free Mount Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Low Speed
branchItem.description: <p>The series CUX single rod, double acting, low speed free mount cylinder saves space and allows direct and precise mounting. Low speed option can be used in low speed and low pressure applications. It is available in 6mm to 32mm bore sizes with stroke lengths up to 50mm. Options include auto-switch capabilities, free mount choices, recessed switch mounting grooves and rubber bumpers standard.  </p>

branchItem.name: 10/11/21/22-C(D)U Double Acting, Single Rod, Clean Room
branchItem.description: <p>The series 10/11/21/22-CU clean series, single rod, double acting free mount cylinder saves space and allows  direct and precise mounting. Clean series includes a relief port that help in removing rod area contaminants. Options include auto-switch capabilities, free mount choices, recessed switch mounting grooves and rubber bumpers standard.</p>

branchItem.name: CU Accessory, Rod End Nut
branchItem.description: <p> The series CU free mount cylinder rod end jam nut.</p>
